contentrichtext.text: '''Qinhuangdao Olympic Sports Center Stadium''' ({{zh|s=秦皇岛市奥体中心体育场|t=秦皇島市奧體中心體育場|p=Qínhuángdǎo Shì Ào Tǐ Zhōngxīn Tǐyùchǎng}}) served as one of the [[Football at the 2008 Summer Olympics|football]] venues during the [[2008 Summer Olympics]]. The multi-use stadium lies inside the Qinhuangdao Olympic Sports Centre on the Hebei Avenue in [[Qinhuangdao]], [[China]]. Its construction was started in May 2002 and completed on July 30, 2004. The sports centre covers 168,000 square metres, the Olympic-standard stadium has a seating capacity of 33,572, 0.2% of which are reserved for the disabled persons. ==References== *[http://en.beijing2008.cn/venues/qhd/index.shtml Beijing2008.cn profile] *[http://www.qhdtyj.gov.cn/aoti/ Qinhuangdao Sports website] {{zh icon}} {{2008 Summer Olympics venues}} {{Olympic venues football}} {{coord|39.907325|119.547708|display=title|format=dms|type:landmark_scale:3000}} [[Category:Football venues in China]] [[Category:Athletics (track and field) venues in China]] [[Category:2008 Summer Olympic venues]] [[Category:Olympic football venues]] [[Category:Sports venues in Hebei]] {{PRC-sports-venue-stub}} {{olympic-stub}}
